title: The Noisy underwater world of the Weddell seal
creator_credit: William Claiborne Incorporated and William L. Claiborne
brief_description: Shows the Weddell seal under Antarctic ice and reports on the strange sounds of the seal as picked up on hydrophones by a team of biologists and bio-accousticians. Suitable for upper secondary level.
